gobblin.data.management.copy

Class RecursiveCopyableDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.SinglePartitionCopyableDataset
      • gobblin.data.management.copy.RecursiveCopyableDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CopyableDataset, PartitionableDataset<CopyableFile>, gobblin.dataset.Dataset

    public class RecursiveCopyableDataset
extends SinglePartitionCopyableDataset
    Implementation of CopyableDataset that creates a CopyableFile for every file that is a descendant if the root directory.
